# AVCaptureViewDelegate

**Protocol**

The protocol that defines the methods you can implement to respond to capture view events.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol AVCaptureViewDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Starting a New Recording

- **captureView(_:startRecordingTo:)**: Tells the delegate that the user has made a request to start a new recording.

## Configuring the Delegate

- **delegate**: The capture view’s delegate object.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol

items.description: Tells the delegate that the user has made a request to start a new recording.
items.name: captureView(_:startRecordingTo:)
